image.ratio_avoid_cropping_info: Choose "Original image ratio" to avoid image cropping. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/theme-images#best-practices-for-slideshows-and-full-widtw-images)

section.allow_transparent_header_info: This setting only applies when this section is the first one.

video.video_info: Replaces external video URL if both are specified.
video.autoplay_info: Video are muted to allow autoplay.
video.ratio_avoid_cropping_info: Choose "Original video ratio" to avoid video cropping. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/theme-images#best-practices-for-slideshows-and-full-widtw-images)

localization.country_region_selector_category_info: To add a country/region, go to your [markets settings](/admin/settings/markets).
localization.language_selector_category_info: To add a language, go to your [language settings](/admin/settings/languages).

faceting.show_group_name_info: Group name will be shown inside selected filters.

code.liquid_info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

product_list.products_per_row_desktop_info: Items per row can be changed automatically by the theme to avoid very narrow cards.
product_list.show_grid_mode_selector_info: Allows customers to customize the size of products card.
product_list.spacing_category_info: A higher value increases spacing proportionally.
product_list.hide_product_information_info: Create an immersive image-first experience by hiding product information.
product_list.hide_product_information_collection_info: Create an immersive image-first experience by hiding product information. Product information is always hidden when compact mode is selected.

blog.show_category_info: Add tag to organize blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#add-tags-to-a-blog-post).

appearance.name: Appearance
appearance.info_paragraph: Adapt the theme to your brand style by changing rounded elements, spacing and icons style.

colors.name: Colors
colors.default_color_scheme_info: Used on secondary pages like customer accounts or policy pages.
colors.button_icon_category_info: Applies to circled buttons such as navigation or close buttons.

typography.name: Typography
typography.heading_size_factor_info: All headings are increased or decreased proportionally.
typography.font_info: Selecting different fonts can affect the speed of your online store. Learn more about [system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

currency_format.name: Currency format
currency_format.currency_codes_paragraph: Cart and checkout total prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

animation.name: Animation
animation.minimize_motion_paragraph: Users who configured their preferences to minimize non-essential motion will automatically experience reduced animations.
animation.show_page_transition_info: Fade in and out when the page changes.
animation.show_image_zoom_on_hover_info: Applies to different sections such as collection list, mega-menu...
animation.stagger_blog_posts_apparition: Reveal blog posts one by one
animation.stagger_menu_apparition: Reveal menu items one by one

color_swatch.name: Color swatch
color_swatch.configuration_info: Native color swatch should be used instead. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/themes/theme-structure/theme-settings#options-with-swatches). Configuration based color swatches is deprecated and will be removed in the future. If you still need to use the configuration based system, you can [learn more](https://prestige-theme.helpscoutdocs.com/article/417-configuring-color-swatches) about the exact naming convention.

product_card.name: Product card
product_card.product_title_max_lines: Title maximum lines (0 to never truncate)
product_card.rating_category_info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

cart.name: Cart
cart.free_shipping_bar_category_info: Show a shipping message advancement on cart page and cart drawer. Configure your [shipping rates](/admin/settings/shipping) to match the amount.
cart.free_shipping_bar_minimum_amount_info: Indicate the value in your store main currency, without currency code. To have different amount per market, use the [Translate & Adapt app](https://apps.shopify.com/translate-and-adapt).

cart_drawer.name: Cart drawer
cart_drawer.page_info: Cart drawer won't appear to your customers if you have set the cart type to Page in the global theme settings.
cart_drawer.free_shipping_bar_info: Free shipping bar can be configured in global cart settings.
cart_drawer.cross_sell_products_info: Products already in the cart or that are sold out are hidden.

collection_banner.name: Collection banner
collection_banner.image_info: 3000 x 1000px .jpg recommended. Default to collection image.
collection_banner.mobile_image_info: 1125 x 140px .jpg recommended. Default to collection image.
collection_banner.colors_category_info: Ignored when there is no image.

collection.name: Collection
collection.expand_to_fill_row_info: Ignored when collections do not stack.

dropdown.name: Dropdown
dropdown.values_info: Separate each value by a comma.

countdown_timer.name: Countdown timer
countdown_timer.timezone_information: Expiration date is calculated from the [store primary timezone](/admin/settings/general).
countdown_timer.expiration_date_info: Use the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM (hours and minutes are optional). Do not use a date farther than 99 days.

footer.name: Footer
footer.show_social_media_info: Configure your social links in your [brand settings](/admin/settings/branding) or your theme social media settings.

text.name: Text
text.show_follow_on_shop_info: To allow customers to follow your store on the Shop app from your storefront, Shop Pay must be enabled. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/follow-on-shop)

links.name: Links
links.menu_info: This menu won't show dropdown items.

newsletter.name: Newsletter
newsletter.newsletter_info: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing" [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).

header.name: Header
header.menu_open_trigger_info: Click mode is forced on touch devices.
header.transparent_header_info: To show a transparent header, add a compatible section (such as slideshow) as the first section. [Learn more](https://prestige-theme.helpscoutdocs.com/article/501-transparent-header)
header.transparent_header_logo_size_recommendat: Use the same dimensions as main logo.

mega_menu.name: Mega menu
mega_menu.menu_item_info: Enter menu item to apply a mega menu dropdown. [Learn more](https://prestige-theme.helpscoutdocs.com/article/412-mega-menu).

image_with_text.name: Image with text
image_with_text.mobile_image_size_recommendation: 1000 x 1000px .jpg recommended. Default to desktop image.

image_with_text_block.name: Image with text block
image_with_text_block.mobile_image_size_recommendation: 1100 x 1500px .jpg recommended. Default to desktop image.

image_with_text_overlay.name: Image with text overlay
image_with_text_overlay.mobile_image_size_recommendation: 1100 x 1500px .jpg recommended. Default to desktop image.

images_with_text_scroll.name: Images with text scroll
images_with_text_scroll.instructions: Configure content by adding blocks. The section adapts automatically to fill exactly the screen height.
images_with_text_scroll.background_image_info: 3000 x 1800px .jpg recommended. Image edges may be cut to adjust to the screen size.
images_with_text_scroll.mobile_background_image_info: 1600 x 2000px .jpg recommended. Image edges may be cut to adjust to the screen size.

image_with_text.name: Image with text
image_with_text.content_info: For best results, keep this text short (4-5 lines maximum).

main_article.name: Blog post
main_article.comments_category_info: Configure your blog to allow comments. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/blogs/managing-comments#allow-or-disable-comments-on-a-blog)

main_blog.name: Blog
main_blog.featured_blog_post_category_info: On small screen, featured blog post is displayed as a standard card.

main_cart.name: Cart
main_cart.show_accelerated_buttons_info: Configure accelerated payment buttons in your [payment settings](https://www.shopify.com/admin/settings/payments).

main_collection.name: Collection page
main_collection.quick_links_menu_info: This menu won't show dropdown items.

main_gift_card.name: Gift card
main_gift_card.gift_card_image_info: 600 x 600px .jpg recommended. Default to gift card product image

content.name: Content
content.instructions: Write a message to your customers by configuring your [password preferences](/admin/online_store/preferences).
content.show_newsletter_form_info: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing" [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).

social_media.name: Social media
social_media.instructions: Configure your social links in your [brand settings](/admin/settings/branding) or your theme social media settings.

main_product.name: Product page
main_product.product_info_size_info: Product media will fill the remaining space.
main_product.center_basic_info_info: Includes title, vendor, price and rating.
main_product.enable_media_autoplay_info: Video are muted automatically to allow autoplay.
main_product.image_zoom_category_info: Zoom won't show video or 3D models

badges.name: Badges
badges.instructions: Use metafields to add custom badges. [Learn more](https://prestige-theme.helpscoutdocs.com/article/437-custom-badges-with-metafields)

payment_terms.name: Payment installments
payment_terms.instructions: To display payment installments, your store needs to support Shop Pay Installments. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shop-pay-installments)

rating.name: Rating
rating.instructions: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews/installation)

variant_picker.name: Variant picker
variant_picker.variant_image_options_info: List of comma separated option names where option values show the attached variant image. [Learn more](https://prestige-theme.helpscoutdocs.com/article/476-variant-images-for-color-option)
variant_picker.size_chart_page_info: Feature a page for size option

product_variations.name: Product variations
product_variations.instructions: Use metafields to easily setup product variations. [Learn more](https://prestige-theme.helpscoutdocs.com/article/426-product-variations-linked-products)
product_variations.option_value_metafield_info: Enter as a text the namespace and key of the metafield holding the value. Eg.: custom.color
product_variations.product_list_info: Select all the variations (including the product itself).

line_item_property.name: Line item property
line_item_property.line_item_info: Line item properties are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart.
line_item_property.required_info: If required, the customer must write a text (for text property) or tick the box (for checkbox property) to add to the cart.
line_item_property.text_type_category_info: Only applicable for line item property of type Text.
line_item_property.checkbox_type_category_info: Only applicable for line item property of type Checkbox.
line_item_property.checkbox_value_info: Appears on the order when checked.
line_item_property.dropdown_type_category_info: Only applicable for line item property of type Dropdown.
line_item_property.dropdown_values_info: Separate each values by a comma.

quantity_selector.name: Quantity selector
quantity_selector.instructions: The selector is automatically hidden if all variants are sold out. When at least one variant is available, the selector is always visible to prevent the page from moving when switching variants.

inventory.name: Inventory
inventory.low_inventory_threshold_info: Use low stock color when quantity is below the threshold. Choose 0 to always show in stock.
inventory.progress_bar_max_value_info: Advancement is calculated according to this value.

buy_buttons.name: Buy buttons
buy_buttons.show_payment_button_info: Each customer will see their preferred payment method from those available on your store, such as PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)
buy_buttons.show_gift_card_recipient: Show recipient information form for gift cards
buy_buttons.show_gift_card_recipient_info: Allow buyers to send gift cards to a recipient along with a personal message. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/customizing-themes/add-gift-card-recipient-fields)

pickup_availability.name: Pickup availability
pickup_availability.instructions: Allow your customers to see availability in retail stores by [setting up local pickup](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/sell-in-person/shopify-pos/order-management/local-pickup-for-online-orders).

complementary_products.name: Complementary products
complementary_products.instructions: To select complementary products, use the Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations#complementary-products)

reviews.name: Reviews
reviews.instructions: Show reviews below the product gallery, inside a collapsible. To show your reviews at a different position, use the dedicated block of your app instead.
reviews.liquid_info: Integrate natively with the free [Shopify Reviews app](https://apps.shopify.com/product-reviews). To show reviews coming from a different review app, contact the support of your app.

modal.name: Modal
modal.instructions: Show secondary information in a modal.

button.name: Button
button.instructions: Create link to your contact page, external marketplace...

share_buttons.name: Share buttons
share_buttons.instructions: To improve user experience and performance, native share buttons are used when supported.

more_information.name: More information
more_information.instructions: On desktop, display a link that scroll to extra information below image gallery. If no extra information is specified, this block is automatically hidden.

image.name: Image
image.column_width_info: On desktop, the sum must be equal to 100% to fill a row.
image.row_count_info: Control the row size in the section general settings.

multiple_media_with_text.name: Multiple media with text
multiple_media_with_text.media_category_info: Alignment offset only applies when alignment is set to top or bottom.

newsletter.name: Newsletter
newsletter.instructions: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing" [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).
newsletter.mobile_image_size_recommendation: 1100 x 1500px .jpg recommended. Default to desktop image.

newsletter_popup.name: Newsletter popup
newsletter_popup.instructions: Customers who subscribe will have their email address added to the "accepts marketing" [customer list](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1).

privacy_banner.name: Privacy banner
privacy_banner.show_privacy_banner_info: Privacy banner will only be visible if it fulfills the conditions of the [Shopify Customer Privacy API](https://shopify.dev/docs/themes/consent-tracking-api)

related_products.name: Related products
related_products.info: Dynamic recommendations change and improve with time. Create manual product recommendations using the Shopify Search & Discovery app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/search-and-discovery/product-recommendations).

scrolling_content.name: Scrolling content
scrolling_content.typography_category_info: Font size gradually increases on intermediate screen sizes.
scrolling_content.spacing_category_info: Spacing gradually increases on intermediate screen sizes.

image.name: Image
image.instructions: Image size automatically adapts to the section font size.

look.name: Look
look.image_size_recommendation: 1200 x 1200px .jpg recommended. For best results, use the same image dimension for each look.

slideshow.name: Slideshow
slideshow.show_initial_transition_info: Removing the initial transition can help improve perceived performance.
slideshow.autoplay_pause_on_video: Pause auto rotate until video finishes
slideshow.background_info: Used while slide is loading or changing.
slideshow.controls_color_info: Used for navigation dots and video mute icon.

image.name: Image
image.button_1_link_info: To make the slide fully clickable, leave the "Button 1 text" and "Button 2" settings empty.

tab.name: Tab
tab.open_on_mobile_info: On mobile, each tab is displayed in an accordion for easier content discovery.

video.name: Video
video.info: For best visual results and avoid platform branding, use a MP4 file.
video.poster_image_info: 3200 x 1600px .jpg recommended. Poster is not visible when autoplay is enabled.

play_button.name: Play button
play_button.info: Play button is hidden when autoplay is enabled.
